snippet.title: Johnny Depp claims Amber Heard plied him with booze during alcoholism recovery
snippet.description: Johnny Depp has claimed Amber Heard gave him shots of whiskey while he battled alcoholism, the High Court heard today.  The Pirates Of The Caribbean star, 57, claimed his ex-wife drank up to three bottles of wine a night herself as he spoke on his fourth day of testimony at his libel trial.  He said Heard, 34, was unsupportive of his recovery from drink and drugs and would leave him a drink of bourbon whiskey on their nightstand for him to drink while she slept.  Depp said this is part of a pattern of "controlling" behaviour by Heard, which also included getting angry with him for taking off his boots as she liked to do it herself.  The actor is suing News Group Newspapers (NGN), and The Sun's executive editor Dan Wootton for libel over an April 201 article that referred to him as a "wife-beater", which he denies, claiming Heard was the abuser in their marriage.   Speaking in court today, Depp's lawyer David Sherborne said: "Ms Wass [for NGN] chenged you saying Ms Heard was not always ...
